summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Dept.; authorizing the completion of construction activities on the Beach Drive Southwest Seawall project; authorizing the hiring of consultants; increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1986 Budget of the Seattle Engineering Dept.; making appropriations from the Engineering Dept. Operating Fund and the Seattle General Street Improvement Bonds, 1960 Fund (60SB); and authorizing the awarding of contracts therefor.
